poem:
### The Sum of Silence

Oligarch whispers  
over continents—  
paper trails  
dancing the distance  
between hands,  
like a waltz of shadows.  

In whispered corridors,  
accounts asleep—  
a billion speaks  
in the forest of numbers,  
hidden under  
layers of silence,  
where echoes rest  
in the coffers of clouds.
